text: Was thinking about Robert Putnam and asked myself if we could poll NextDoor app users to see what percentage of them voted. A cursory google search turned this up: <http://www.cc.gatech.edu/~keith/pubs/nextdoor-chi2014.pdf>
Gonna read but the intro alone makes it seem promising.

attachments.title: Get Out the Vote: Introducing the Nextdoor Vote Map
attachments.text: We believe that communities are stronger when neighbors are civically engaged, and we want to encourage neighbors everywhere to participate in the upcoming local elections.
attachments.fallback: Nextdoor Blog: Get Out the Vote: Introducing the Nextdoor Vote Map

text: I emailed the author of this post who does PR for Nextdoor.
To see if they have plans to share results or anonymized data.
